metadata.titleEn: Dataset of Heihe integrated observatory network: eddy covariance system of Zhangye wetland station, 2022
metadata.titleCn: 黑河流域地表过程综合观测网：张掖湿地站涡动相关仪（2022）
metadata.description:
This dataset contains the flux measurements from the Zhangye wetland station eddy covariance system (EC) in the midstream reaches of the Heihe integrated observatory network from January 1 to December 31 in 2022. The site (100.44640° E, 38.97514° N) was located in the Zhangye City in Gansu Province. The elevation is 1460 m. The EC was installed at a height of 5.2 m, and the sampling rate was 10 Hz. The sonic anemometer faced north, and the separation distance between the sonic anemometer and the CO2/H2O gas analyzer (Gill&Li7500A) was 0.25 m.
The raw data acquired at 10 Hz were processed using the Eddypro post-processing software, including the spike detection, lag correction of H2O/CO2 relative to the vertical wind component, sonic virtual temperature correction, coordinate rotation (2-D rotation), corrections for density fluctuation (Webb-Pearman-Leuning correction), and frequency response correction. The EC data were subsequently averaged over 30 min periods. The observation data quality was divided into three classes according to the quality assessment method of stationarity (Δst) and the integral turbulent characteristics test (ITC): class 1-3 (high quality), class 4-6 (good), class 7-8 (poor, better than gap filling data), class9 (rejected). In addition to the above processing steps, the half-hourly flux data were screened in a four-step procedure: (1) data from periods of sensor malfunction were rejected; (2) data collected before or after 1 h of precipitation were rejected; (3) incomplete 30 min data were rejected when the missing data constituted more than 3% of the 30 min raw record. There were 48 records per day, and the missing data were replaced with -6999. Suspicious data were marked in red. 
The released data contained the following variables: data/time, wind direction (Wdir, °), wind speed (Wnd, m/s), the standard deviation of the lateral wind (Std_Uy, m/s), virtual temperature (Tv, ℃), H2O mass density (H2O, g/m3), CO2 mass density (CO2, mg/m3), friction velocity (ustar, m/s), stability (z/L), sensible heat flux (Hs, W/m2), latent heat flux (LE, W/m2), carbon dioxide flux (Fc, mg/ (m2s)), quality assessment of the sensible heat flux (QA_Hs), quality assessment of the latent heat flux (QA_LE), and quality assessment of the carbon flux (QA_Fc). In this dataset, the time of 0:30 corresponds to the average data for the period between 0:00 and 0:30; the data were stored in *.xls format. Detailed information can be found in the suggested references.
For more information, please refer to Liu et al. (2018) (for sites information), Liu et al. (2011) for data processing) in the Citation section.
metadata.descriptionCn:
该数据集包含了2022年1月1日至2022年12月31日的黑河水文气象观测网中游张掖湿地站涡动相关仪观测数据。站点位于甘肃省张掖市，下垫面是湿地。观测点的经纬度是100.44640E, 38.97514N，海拔1460.00m。涡动相关仪的架高5.2m，采样频率是10Hz，超声朝向是正北向，超声风速温度仪（Gill）与CO2/H2O分析仪(Li7500A)之间的距离是25cm。
涡动相关仪的原始观测数据为10Hz，发布的数据是采用Eddypro软件处理的30分钟数据，其处理的主要步骤包括：野点值剔除，延迟时间校正，坐标旋转（二次坐标旋转），频率响应修正，超声虚温修正和密度（WPL）修正等。同时对各通量值进行质量评价，主要是大气平稳性（Δst）和湍流相似性特征（ITC）的检验。对Eddypro软件输出的30min通量值也进行了筛选：（1）剔除仪器出错时的数据；（2）剔除降水前后1h的数据；（3）剔除10Hz原始数据中每30min内缺失率大于10%的数据。观测数据的平均周期为30分钟，一天48个数据，缺失数据标记为-6999。
发布的观测数据包括：日期/时间Date/Time，风向Wdir（°），水平风速Wnd（m/s），侧向风速标准差Std_Uy（m/s），超声虚温Tv（℃），水汽密度H2O（g/m3），二氧化碳浓度CO2（mg/m3），摩擦速度Ustar（m/s），奥布霍夫长度L（m），感热通量Hs（W/m2），潜热通量LE（W/m2），二氧化碳通量Fc（mg/(m2s)），感热通量的质量标识QA_Hs，潜热通量的质量标识QA_LE，二氧化碳通量的质量标识QA_Fc。感热、潜热、二氧化碳通量的质量标识分为九级（质量标识1-3数据质量好，4-6数据质量较好，7-8数据质量较差（较插补数据好）；9数据质量差））。数据时间的含义，如0:30代表0:00-0:30的平均；数据以*.xls格式存储。
黑河流域地表过程综合观测网或站点信息请参考Liu et al. (2018)，观测数据处理请参考Liu et al. (2011)。

background: Arid and semiarid regions represent approximately 30 % of the global terrestrial surface area (Dregne, 1991; Scanlon et al., 2006), and dryland expansion occurs under climate change, especially in developing countries (Huang et al., 2016). An oasis is a unique ecological landscape in arid and semi-arid areas that is not only the core of regions’ ecological environment but also the foundation of their economic development, especially in western China, which has been an important part of the “Silk Road” since ancient times. Oases comprising less than 10 % of the total area of arid regions support more than 90 % of the population in these regions of China (Chu et al., 2005; Li et al., 2016; Zhou et al., 2022). The oasis–desert system plays a crucial role in maintaining a stable ecological environment and agricultural productivity (Zhang and Zhao, 2015). Extensive studies have investigated energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas based on field and remote-sensing observations (Taha et al., 1991; Potchter et al., 2008; Xue et al., 2019; Wang et al., 2019; Zhou et al., 2022) and numerical simulations (Chu et al., 2005; Meng et al., 2009; Georgescu et al., 2011; Liu et al., 2020). In addition, oasis–desert areas located in semiarid regions have been found to be carbon sinks by previous researchers (Tagesson et al., 2016; Wang et al., 2019); thus, they can significantly affect the carbon balance of arid regions and play an increasingly important role within the global carbon cycle.
research objective: Therefore, it is critical to maintain the balance between oasis and desert systems in order to achieve the goal of sustainable oasis development. Understanding the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems is important to achieve the goals of carbon peaking and carbon neutrality in the oasis–desert area and support the ecological security and sustainable development of the oasis. A quantitative understanding of the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas is crucial to recognize the oasis–desert interactions and is significant to protect the ecological stability and socioeconomic development of oases; moreover, long-term observations are indispensable.
challenges: Inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas are facing the crisis of ecological environment degradation, such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, the degradation of natural vegetation, the intensification of land desertification, and the frequent occurrence of dust storms, especially in many inland river basins westward along the Silk Road, such as the Tarim River basin (Zhao et al., 2013), the Aral Sea basin (Stanev et al., 2004; Crétaux et al., 2009), and the Lake Urmia basin (Stone, 2015).
methods: In this study, we present a suite of observational datasets from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems that consist of long-term energy, water vapor, carbon and methane fluxes as well as auxiliary data involving hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters from 2012 to 2021. Half-hourly turbulent flux data were acquired by an eddy covariance system and scintillometer. The hydrometeorological data (including radiation, soil heat flux, and soil temperature profiles; gradients of air temperature and humidity and of wind speed and direction; and air pressure, precipitation, and soil moisture profiles) were observed from automatic weather stations with a 10 min average period as well as the groundwater table data. Moreover, vegetation and soil parameters were also supplemented in the datasets. The data processing and quality control procedure can be divided into data collection, data processing, and data archiving and sharing.
dataset: The study area comprises the middle and lower reaches of the HRB, located in the arid regions of western China, that receive water from the typical cryosphere of the upper reaches. A total of 11 land surface flux and meteorological stations have been established in these regions since 2012 – 2 superstations and 9 ordinary stations. The dataset of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations in oasis–desert areas reported in this study (including energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes; hydrometeorological data; and vegetation and soil parameters) is freely available from the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center.
backgroundCn: 干旱和半干旱地区约占全球陆地表面积的30%（Dregne, 1991；Scanlon et al., 2006），在气候变化的影响下，干旱地区的扩展尤其发生在发展中国家（Huang et al., 2016）。绿洲是干旱和半干旱地区独特的生态景观，不仅是这些地区生态环境的核心，也是经济发展的基础，特别是在中国西部，自古以来就一直是“丝绸之路”的重要组成部分。绿洲占干旱地区总面积的不到10%，却支持了中国这些地区90%以上的人口（Chu et al., 2005；Li et al., 2016；Zhou et al., 2022）。绿洲-沙漠系统在维持稳定的生态环境和农业生产力方面发挥着至关重要的作用（Zhang and Zhao, 2015）。大量研究基于实地和遥感观测（Taha et al., 1991；Potchter et al., 2008；Xue et al., 2019；Wang et al., 2019；Zhou et al., 2022）以及数值模拟（Chu et al., 2005；Meng et al., 2009；Georgescu et al., 2011；Liu et al., 2020）对绿洲-沙漠地区的能量、水汽和碳交换进行了广泛研究。此外，位于半干旱地区的绿洲-沙漠区域已被前期研究者发现是碳汇（Tagesson et al., 2016；Wang et al., 2019）；因此，它们可以显著影响干旱地区的碳平衡，并在全球碳循环中发挥越来越重要的作用。
research objectiveCn: 因此，维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对于实现可持续绿洲发展的目标至关重要。了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征，对于实现绿洲-沙漠地区的碳达峰和碳中和目标，以及支持绿洲的生态安全和可持续发展具有重要意义。对绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换的定量理解对于认识绿洲-沙漠之间的相互作用至关重要，并且对保护生态稳定性和绿洲的社会经济发展具有重要意义；此外，长期观测是不可或缺的。
challengesCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临生态环境退化的危机，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化加剧以及沙尘暴频繁发生，尤其是在丝绸之路沿线的许多内陆河流流域，如塔里木河流域（赵等，2013），咸海流域（Stanev等，2004；Crétaux等，2009）和乌尔米湖流域（Stone，2015）。
methodsCn: 在本研究中，我们呈现了一套来自人工和自然绿洲-沙漠系统的观测数据集，这些数据集包含了2012年至2021年的长期能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量，以及涉及水文气象、植被和土壤参数的辅助数据。半小时的湍流通量数据是通过涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取的。水文气象数据（包括辐射、土壤热通量和土壤温度剖面；空气温度和湿度的梯度，风速和风向的梯度；以及气压、降水和土壤湿度剖面）是通过自动气象站以10分钟的平均周期观测的，同时也包括地下水位数据。此外，数据集中还补充了植被和土壤参数。数据处理和质量控制程序可以分为数据收集、数据处理和数据归档与共享。
datasetCn: 研究区域包括位于中国西部干旱地区的HRB中下游，水源来自上游典型的冰冻圈。自2012年以来，在这些地区建立了11个地表通量和气象站，其中包括2个超级站和9个普通站。本研究报告的绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换观测数据集（包括能量、水汽和碳通量；水文气象数据；以及植被和土壤参数）可从国家西藏高原数据中心免费获取。

Verification.QuestionEn: Does the data collection method for energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations in oasis–desert areas include the use of eddy covariance systems and scintillometers?
Verification.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠地区的能量、水汽和碳交换观测的数据收集方法中，是否包括使用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪？

Verification.QuestionEn: Is the data processing for the eddy covariance system's observations performed using Eddypro software?
Verification.QuestionCn: 涡动协方差系统的观测数据处理是否使用Eddypro软件？

Disjunctive.QuestionEn: Does the data collection for energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange primarily utilize eddy covariance systems, scintillometers, or automatic weather stations?
Disjunctive.QuestionCn: 能量、水汽和碳交换的数据收集主要使用涡度协方差系统、闪烁仪还是自动气象站？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: When is data excluded from the eddy covariance system observations?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 何时从涡度协方差系统观测中排除数据？

Concept Completion.QuestionEn: Where can datasets related to energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas be accessed?
Concept Completion.QuestionCn: 可以在哪里获取与绿洲-沙漠地区的能源、水汽和碳交换相关的数据集？
Concept Completion.AnswerCn: 国家青藏高原数据中心

Example.QuestionEn: Can you provide an example of a data collection method used for measuring energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个用于测量绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的数据收集方法的例子？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a data collection method used for measuring these exchanges is the eddy covariance system, which is utilized alongside scintillometers to acquire half-hourly turbulent flux data.
Example.AnswerCn: 用于测量这些交换的一个数据收集方法是涡度协方差系统，它与闪烁仪一起使用，以获取每半小时的湍流通量数据。

Example.QuestionEn: What is an example of a challenge faced when collecting long-term observational datasets in arid and semiarid inland river basins?
Example.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱内陆河流流域收集长期观察数据集时面临的一个挑战是什么？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of a challenge is the ecological environment degradation in these regions, such as the drying up of rivers and lakes, degradation of natural vegetation, and intensification of land desertification, which complicate data collection and impact the overall stability of the collected datasets.
Example.AnswerCn: 一个挑战是这些地区的生态环境退化，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化以及土地沙漠化加剧，这使得数据收集变得复杂，并影响所收集数据集的整体稳定性。

Example.QuestionEn: Could you provide an example of a comprehensive dataset available for energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations in oasis–desert areas?
Example.QuestionCn: 您能否提供一个关于绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换观测的综合数据集的示例？
Example.AnswerEn: An example of such a dataset is available from the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center, which includes energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes, as well as hydrometeorological, vegetation, and soil parameters collected from multiple land surface flux and meteorological stations in the middle and lower reaches of the Heihe River Basin.
Example.AnswerCn: 这样的数据集的一个例子可以从国家西藏高原数据中心获得，其中包括来自黑河流域中下游多个陆面通量和气象站收集的能量、水汽和碳通量，以及水文气象、植被和土壤参数。

Feature Specification.QuestionEn: What are the essential characteristics of eddy covariance systems used for energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations in arid and semi-arid regions?
Feature Specification.QuestionCn: 用于干旱和半干旱地区能量、水蒸气和碳交换观测的涡度协方差系统的基本特征是什么？
Feature Specification.AnswerEn: 10Hz frequency, 30-minute average intervals, ultrasonic anemometers, gas analyzers, specific heights, specific orientations
Feature Specification.AnswerCn: 10Hz频率，30分钟平均间隔，超声波风速仪，气体分析仪，特定高度，特定方向。

Quantification.QuestionEn: How many land surface flux and meteorological stations have been established in the middle and lower reaches of the HRB since 2012?
Quantification.QuestionCn: 自2012年以来，HRB中下游地区建立了多少个陆面通量和气象站？

Definition.QuestionEn: What is the 'eddy covariance method' used for data collection in environmental research?
Definition.QuestionCn: “涡度协方差法”用于环境研究中的数据收集是什么？
Definition.AnswerEn: The eddy covariance method is a data collection technique used to measure and calculate turbulent fluxes of momentum, heat, water vapor, and carbon dioxide between the surface and the atmosphere. This method involves using instruments like ultrasonic anemometers and gas analyzers, such as the CO2/H2O analyzer, to record data at high frequencies (e.g., 10Hz), which is then processed to produce average flux values over longer periods (e.g., 30 minutes) using software like Eddypro.
Definition.AnswerCn: 涡度协方差法是一种数据收集技术，用于测量和计算表面与大气之间的动量、热量、水蒸气和二氧化碳的湍流通量。该方法涉及使用超声波风速计和气体分析仪（如CO2/H2O分析仪）等仪器，以高频率（例如10Hz）记录数据，然后使用Eddypro等软件处理数据，以产生较长时间（例如30分钟）的平均通量值。

Definition.QuestionEn: What are 'oasis–desert interactions' and why are they significant in environmental research?
Definition.QuestionCn: 什么是“绿洲-沙漠相互作用”，为什么它们在环境研究中具有重要意义？
Definition.AnswerEn: Oasis–desert interactions refer to the exchanges and balance of energy, water vapor, and carbon between oasis and desert ecosystems. These interactions are significant in environmental research as they play a critical role in maintaining ecological stability, supporting agricultural productivity, and influencing the carbon balance in arid and semi-arid regions. Understanding these interactions is crucial for achieving sustainable development, ecological security, and addressing carbon cycle dynamics in these regions.
Definition.AnswerCn: 绿洲与沙漠的相互作用指的是绿洲与沙漠生态系统之间能量、水汽和碳的交换与平衡。这些相互作用在环境研究中具有重要意义，因为它们在维持生态稳定、支持农业生产力以及影响干旱和半干旱地区的碳平衡方面发挥着关键作用。理解这些相互作用对于实现可持续发展、生态安全以及应对这些地区的碳循环动态至关重要。

Comparison.QuestionEn: What are the differences in the quality control procedures for data collected from the Heihe River Basin's Zhangye Wetland Station and a similar dataset from oasis–desert areas?
Comparison.QuestionCn: Heihe River Basin的张掖湿地站收集的数据与来自绿洲-沙漠地区的类似数据在质量控制程序上有哪些差异？
Comparison.AnswerEn: The Heihe River Basin's Zhangye Wetland Station employs a quality control process that includes data filtering based on instrument errors and precipitation events, as well as checks for high missing data rates. In comparison, datasets from oasis–desert areas undergo a broader quality control process encompassing data collection, processing, and archiving, integrating diverse environmental parameters, and likely involving additional checks tailored to specific environmental conditions.
Comparison.AnswerCn: 黑河流域的张掖湿地站采用质量控制流程，包括基于仪器误差和降水事件的数据过滤，以及对高缺失数据率的检查。相比之下，来自绿洲-沙漠地区的数据集则经历更广泛的质量控制流程，涵盖数据收集、处理和归档，整合多种环境参数，并可能涉及针对特定环境条件的额外检查。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: What can be inferred about the ecological stability of oasis-desert systems based on the observed patterns in energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange data?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 根据观察到的能量、水汽和碳交换数据，可以推断出绿洲-沙漠系统的生态稳定性如何？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The observed patterns in energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange data could provide insights into the balance between oasis and desert systems, which is crucial for maintaining ecological stability and achieving sustainable development goals in these regions.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 观察到的能量、水蒸气和碳交换数据的模式可以为绿洲和沙漠系统之间的平衡提供洞察，这对于维持生态稳定和实现这些地区的可持续发展目标至关重要。

Interpretation.QuestionEn: How might the challenges of ecological environment degradation in arid and semiarid inland river basins influence the methodologies used for data collection in these areas?
Interpretation.QuestionCn: 干旱和半干旱内陆河流流域生态环境退化的挑战可能会如何影响这些地区数据收集的方法论？
Interpretation.AnswerEn: The challenges such as drying rivers, vegetation degradation, and land desertification may necessitate the use of robust, long-term observational methods and advanced data processing techniques to accurately capture the environmental changes and to support effective ecological management strategies.
Interpretation.AnswerCn: 干涸的河流、植被退化和土地沙漠化等挑战可能需要使用稳健的长期观测方法和先进的数据处理技术，以准确捕捉环境变化，并支持有效的生态管理策略。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What factors contribute to the need for data quality evaluation in energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange data collected in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中收集的能量、水汽和碳交换数据需要进行数据质量评估的因素有哪些？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: Data quality evaluation in energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange data in oasis–desert ecosystems is necessary due to the complex environmental interactions and challenges faced in these regions, such as atmospheric stability and turbulent flux characteristics. These factors require rigorous quality checks to ensure the accuracy and reliability of the data, especially for understanding carbon sinks and ecological interactions in arid regions.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中，能源、水汽和碳交换数据的质量评估是必要的，因为这些地区面临复杂的环境相互作用和挑战，例如大气稳定性和湍流通量特征。这些因素需要严格的质量检查，以确保数据的准确性和可靠性，特别是在理解干旱地区的碳汇和生态相互作用时。

Causal Antecedent.QuestionEn: What drives the need for long-term observational datasets in studying oasis–desert systems in arid regions?
Causal Antecedent.QuestionCn: 在研究干旱地区的绿洲-沙漠系统时，是什么推动了对长期观测数据集的需求？
Causal Antecedent.AnswerEn: The need for long-term observational datasets in studying oasis–desert systems is driven by the necessity to capture the temporal variability and trends in energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes. This is essential to understand the interactions between oasis and desert systems, assess the impacts of climate change, and support the sustainable management of these regions, which face ecological challenges like land degradation and water scarcity.
Causal Antecedent.AnswerCn: 研究绿洲-沙漠系统对长期观测数据集的需求，源于捕捉能量、水蒸气和碳通量的时间变异性和趋势的必要性。这对于理解绿洲与沙漠系统之间的相互作用、评估气候变化的影响以及支持这些面临生态挑战（如土地退化和水资源短缺）地区的可持续管理至关重要。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: What are the potential consequences of utilizing high-frequency eddy covariance systems for measuring energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 利用高频涡度协方差系统测量绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的能量、水蒸气和碳交换的潜在后果是什么？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: Utilizing high-frequency eddy covariance systems can lead to detailed insights into the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems, which are crucial for understanding the interactions within these systems and achieving sustainable development goals. Such systems can help in long-term observations that are indispensable for recognizing ecological stability and supporting socioeconomic development.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 利用高频涡度协方差系统可以深入了解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的基本特征，这对于理解这些系统内的相互作用以及实现可持续发展目标至关重要。这些系统有助于进行长期观测，这对于识别生态稳定性和支持社会经济发展是不可或缺的。

Causal Consequence.QuestionEn: How does the presence of a comprehensive observational network in arid regions influence the understanding of ecological degradation challenges?
Causal Consequence.QuestionCn: 在干旱地区，全面的观测网络的存在如何影响对生态退化挑战的理解？
Causal Consequence.AnswerEn: A comprehensive observational network in arid regions can significantly improve the understanding of ecological degradation challenges by providing essential data on hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters. It helps in identifying issues such as river and lake drying, vegetation degradation, and land desertification, thus aiding in the development of strategies to mitigate these challenges.
Causal Consequence.AnswerCn: 在干旱地区建立一个全面的观测网络可以显著提高对生态退化挑战的理解，通过提供水文气象、植被和土壤参数的基本数据。它有助于识别河流和湖泊干涸、植被退化和土地沙漠化等问题，从而有助于制定减轻这些挑战的策略。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it important to collect long-term observational datasets in oasis–desert systems for understanding energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠系统中收集长期观测数据集对于理解能量、水蒸气和碳交换的重要性是什么？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: A quantitative understanding of the energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert areas is crucial to recognize the oasis–desert interactions and is significant to protect the ecological stability and socioeconomic development of oases; moreover, long-term observations are indispensable.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 对绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换的定量理解对于认识绿洲-沙漠相互作用至关重要，并且对保护绿洲的生态稳定性和社会经济发展具有重要意义；此外，长期观测是不可或缺的。

Goal Orientation.QuestionEn: Why is it critical to maintain a balance between oasis and desert systems when utilizing datasets for sustainable oasis development?
Goal Orientation.QuestionCn: 在利用数据集进行可持续绿洲开发时，为什么在绿洲和沙漠系统之间保持平衡至关重要？
Goal Orientation.AnswerEn: Maintaining the balance between oasis and desert systems is critical to achieve the goal of sustainable oasis development and support the ecological security and sustainable development of the oasis, which involves understanding the basic characteristics of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in these ecosystems.
Goal Orientation.AnswerCn: 维持绿洲与沙漠系统之间的平衡对于实现可持续绿洲发展目标至关重要，并支持绿洲的生态安全和可持续发展，这涉及到理解这些生态系统中能量、水汽和碳交换的基本特征。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What are the key procedural steps involved in processing raw data from an eddy covariance system to ensure high-quality flux measurements in arid and semiarid regions?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 从涡度相关系统处理原始数据以确保在干旱和半干旱地区获得高质量通量测量的关键步骤是什么？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: The key procedural steps in processing raw data from an eddy covariance system include outlier removal, delay time correction, coordinate rotation (two-step coordinate rotation), frequency response correction, ultrasonic virtual temperature correction, and density (WPL) correction. Additionally, quality evaluation of flux values is performed based on atmospheric stability and turbulence similarity characteristics, with further screening of flux values by removing data from faulty instruments and periods of precipitation.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 处理涡度协方差系统原始数据的关键程序步骤包括：异常值去除、延迟时间修正、坐标旋转（两步坐标旋转）、频率响应修正、超声波虚温修正和密度（WPL）修正。此外，还根据大气稳定性和湍流相似性特征对通量值进行质量评估，并通过去除故障仪器的数据和降水期间的数据进一步筛选通量值。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: How can long-term observational datasets be effectively compiled and shared, incorporating diverse data types such as energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes, alongside hydrometeorological and vegetation parameters?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 如何有效地编制和共享长期观测数据集，整合多种数据类型，如能量、水蒸气和碳通量，以及水文气象和植被参数？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Long-term observational datasets can be effectively compiled and shared by establishing a comprehensive data collection process involving an array of land surface flux and meteorological stations. These datasets should include energy, water vapor, and carbon fluxes, as well as auxiliary hydrometeorological, vegetation, and soil parameters. Data processing should involve systematic collection, processing, and archiving procedures, followed by making the data freely available from a central data center, such as the National Tibetan Plateau Data Center.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 长期观测数据集可以通过建立一个全面的数据收集过程来有效编制和共享，该过程涉及一系列陆地表面通量和气象站。这些数据集应包括能量、水蒸气和碳通量，以及辅助的水文气象、植被和土壤参数。数据处理应包括系统的收集、处理和归档程序，然后通过中央数据中心（如国家西藏高原数据中心）将数据免费提供。

Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionEn: What instrumentation and data management practices are necessary to accurately measure and manage hydrometeorological data, including soil heat flux, temperature profiles, and precipitation in oasis–desert systems?
Instrumental/Procedural.QuestionCn: 在绿洲-沙漠系统中，准确测量和管理水文气象数据（包括土壤热通量、温度剖面和降水量）所需的仪器和数据管理实践是什么？
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerEn: Accurate measurement and management of hydrometeorological data require the use of automatic weather stations equipped with instruments for observing radiation, soil heat flux, soil temperature profiles, gradients of air temperature and humidity, wind speed and direction, air pressure, and precipitation. These stations should collect data with a 10-minute average period and include groundwater table measurements. Effective data management practices involve structured data processing, quality control, and routine archiving.
Instrumental/Procedural.AnswerCn: 准确测量和管理水文气象数据需要使用自动气象站，配备用于观察辐射、土壤热通量、土壤温度剖面、空气温度和湿度梯度、风速和风向、气压以及降水的仪器。这些站点应以10分钟的平均周期收集数据，并包括地下水位测量。有效的数据管理实践涉及结构化的数据处理、质量控制和定期归档。

Enablement.QuestionEn: How do data processing techniques, such as coordinate rotation and frequency response corrections, enable the refinement of flux measurements collected in oasis-desert systems?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 数据处理技术，如坐标旋转和频率响应校正，如何使在绿洲-沙漠系统中收集的通量测量得以精细化？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Data processing techniques, including coordinate rotation and frequency response corrections, are crucial for refining flux measurements by aligning wind components and correcting for sensor response times, respectively. These techniques ensure that the data reflects accurate physical processes occurring in oasis-desert systems, aiding in the understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 数据处理技术，包括坐标旋转和频率响应校正，对于通过对齐风分量和校正传感器响应时间来精炼通量测量至关重要。这些技术确保数据反映出在绿洲-沙漠系统中发生的准确物理过程，有助于理解能量、水汽和碳的交换。

Enablement.QuestionEn: In what ways do automatic weather stations contribute to the enablement of continuous hydrometeorological data collection in challenging environments like the Heihe River Basin?
Enablement.QuestionCn: 自动气象站如何促进在像黑河流域这样具有挑战性的环境中连续水文气象数据的收集？
Enablement.AnswerEn: Automatic weather stations facilitate continuous hydrometeorological data collection by providing consistent measurements of variables such as radiation, soil heat flux, air temperature, humidity, and wind speed. These stations operate with a high temporal resolution, such as 10-minute averages, enabling comprehensive monitoring of environmental conditions in challenging areas like the Heihe River Basin.
Enablement.AnswerCn: 自动气象站通过提供辐射、土壤热通量、空气温度、湿度和风速等变量的一致测量，促进了连续的水文气象数据收集。这些站以高时间分辨率运行，例如10分钟平均值，使得在像黑河流域这样的困难地区能够全面监测环境条件。

Expectation.QuestionEn: Why might it be challenging to maintain long-term observational datasets in arid and semiarid inland river basins?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 在干旱和半干旱内陆河流流域中，维护长期观测数据集可能面临哪些挑战？
Expectation.AnswerEn: Inland river basins in arid and semiarid areas face environmental degradation challenges such as drying rivers, vegetation degradation, desertification, and dust storms, particularly in regions along the Silk Road. These challenges can complicate the maintenance of long-term observational datasets.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 内陆河流流域在干旱和半干旱地区面临环境退化的挑战，如河流干涸、植被退化、沙漠化和沙尘暴，特别是在丝绸之路沿线的地区。这些挑战可能会使长期观测数据集的维护变得复杂。

Expectation.QuestionEn: What are the expected benefits of understanding energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems?
Expectation.QuestionCn: 理解绿洲-沙漠生态系统中的能量、水蒸气和碳交换的预期好处是什么？
Expectation.AnswerEn: A quantitative understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems is essential for achieving carbon peaking and carbon neutrality goals, supporting ecological security, and ensuring sustainable development of oases. It also aids in recognizing oasis–desert interactions and protects ecological stability and socioeconomic development.
Expectation.AnswerCn: 对绿洲-沙漠生态系统中能量、水蒸气和碳交换的定量理解，对于实现碳达峰和碳中和目标、支持生态安全以及确保绿洲的可持续发展至关重要。它还有助于认识绿洲-沙漠之间的相互作用，保护生态稳定和社会经济发展。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: How do you evaluate the effectiveness of the data processing methods used for managing large-scale oasis–desert ecosystem datasets?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 如何评估用于管理大规模绿洲-沙漠生态系统数据集的数据处理方法的有效性？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: The data processing methods, including Eddypro software for 30-minute data processing and quality evaluations such as atmospheric stability and turbulence characteristics, are effective for ensuring the reliability of large-scale datasets. These steps, along with quality assessments of flux values, contribute to the robustness of the data collected in oasis–desert ecosystems.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 数据处理方法，包括用于30分钟数据处理的Eddypro软件以及大气稳定性和湍流特征等质量评估，对于确保大规模数据集的可靠性是有效的。这些步骤以及对通量值的质量评估，有助于增强在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中收集的数据的稳健性。

Judgmental.QuestionEn: In what ways could current data collection approaches be improved to better capture the dynamics of oasis–desert systems?
Judgmental.QuestionCn: 当前的数据收集方法可以通过哪些方式改进，以更好地捕捉绿洲-沙漠系统的动态？
Judgmental.AnswerEn: Improvements could include increasing the spatial and temporal resolution of data collection, incorporating additional parameters like methane fluxes, and enhancing the integration of remote sensing data with ground-based observations. These enhancements would provide a more detailed understanding of the complex interactions within oasis–desert systems.
Judgmental.AnswerCn: 改进可以包括提高数据收集的空间和时间分辨率，纳入额外的参数如甲烷通量，以及增强遥感数据与地面观测的整合。这些增强将提供对绿洲-沙漠系统内复杂相互作用的更详细理解。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I don't understand how data collection methods ensure the quality of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations in arid and semiarid regions.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我不明白数据收集方法如何确保干旱和半干旱地区能量、水汽和碳交换观测的质量。
Assertion.AnswerEn: The data collection methods involve using an eddy covariance system and scintillometer to acquire half-hourly turbulent flux data, along with automatic weather stations for hydrometeorological data, which are observed with a 10-minute average period. The data processing includes steps such as quality control procedures, which involve filtering out erroneous data and correcting for time delays, ensuring the reliability of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange observations.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 数据收集方法包括使用涡度协方差系统和闪烁仪获取半小时的湍流通量数据，以及自动气象站获取水文气象数据，后者以10分钟的平均周期进行观测。数据处理包括质量控制程序的步骤，这些步骤涉及过滤掉错误数据和修正时间延迟，以确保能量、水蒸气和碳交换观测的可靠性。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I’m unsure about the challenges faced in collecting and processing data on oasis–desert interactions.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我对收集和处理关于绿洲与沙漠相互作用的数据所面临的挑战感到不确定。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Challenges in collecting and processing data on oasis–desert interactions include the risk of ecological environment degradation such as river and lake drying, natural vegetation degradation, land desertification, and frequent dust storms, particularly in inland river basins. These issues complicate the long-term observation necessary for understanding oasis–desert interactions.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 收集和处理关于绿洲与沙漠相互作用的数据面临的挑战包括生态环境退化的风险，例如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化、土地沙漠化以及频繁的沙尘暴，特别是在内陆河流流域。这些问题使得理解绿洲与沙漠相互作用所需的长期观察变得复杂。

Assertion.QuestionEn: I can't make sense of how long-term datasets support sustainable development in oasis–desert areas.
Assertion.QuestionCn: 我无法理解长期数据集如何支持绿洲-沙漠地区的可持续发展。
Assertion.AnswerEn: Long-term datasets provide a quantitative understanding of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchanges in oasis–desert areas, which is crucial for recognizing interactions and supporting ecological stability. This information is significant for achieving carbon peaking and carbon neutrality goals, and for supporting the sustainable development and ecological security of oases.
Assertion.AnswerCn: 长期数据集提供了对绿洲-沙漠地区能量、水汽和碳交换的定量理解，这对于认识相互作用和支持生态稳定至关重要。这些信息对于实现碳达峰和碳中和目标，以及支持绿洲的可持续发展和生态安全具有重要意义。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please explore the methodologies used in data processing and quality control for hydrometeorological and flux data in arid and semiarid regions.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请探讨在干旱和半干旱地区用于水文气象和通量数据的数据处理和质量控制的方法。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Data processing and quality control involve several steps such as data collection, data processing, and data archiving and sharing. The processing of flux data includes steps like despiking, time delay correction, coordinate rotation, frequency response correction, sonic temperature correction, and WPL correction. Quality evaluation of flux values focuses on testing atmospheric stationarity and turbulence similarity characteristics.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 数据处理和质量控制涉及多个步骤，如数据收集、数据处理以及数据归档和共享。通量数据的处理包括去尖峰、时间延迟校正、坐标旋转、频率响应校正、声学温度校正和WPL校正。通量值的质量评估侧重于测试大气平稳性和湍流相似性特征。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please investigate the challenges faced in maintaining long-term observations of energy, water vapor, and carbon exchange in oasis–desert ecosystems.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请调查在绿洲-沙漠生态系统中维持能量、水汽和碳交换的长期观测所面临的挑战。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Challenges include the degradation of the ecological environment, such as drying rivers and lakes, degradation of natural vegetation, and land desertification, particularly in inland river basins like the Tarim River basin, Aral Sea basin, and Lake Urmia basin. These factors complicate the maintenance of long-term observational datasets in these regions.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 挑战包括生态环境的退化，如河流和湖泊干涸、自然植被退化以及土地沙漠化，特别是在塔里木河流域、咸海流域和乌尔米湖流域等内陆河流域。这些因素使得在这些地区维护长期观测数据集变得复杂。

Request/Directive.QuestionEn: Please examine the potential for expanding datasets related to oasis–desert interactions by utilizing both artificial and natural observational systems.
Request/Directive.QuestionCn: 请检查通过利用人工和自然观测系统扩展与绿洲-沙漠相互作用相关的数据集的潜力。
Request/Directive.AnswerEn: Expanding datasets could involve the integration of observational data from artificial and natural oasis–desert systems, which include long-term energy, water vapor, carbon, and methane fluxes, as well as auxiliary data on hydrometeorology, vegetation, and soil parameters. Establishing more land surface flux and meteorological stations in these regions, with comprehensive data collection and sharing, could enhance dataset expansion.
Request/Directive.AnswerCn: 扩展数据集可能涉及整合来自人工和自然绿洲–沙漠系统的观测数据，包括长期的能量、水蒸气、碳和甲烷通量，以及关于水文气象、植被和土壤参数的辅助数据。在这些地区建立更多的地表通量和气象站，并进行全面的数据收集和共享，可以增强数据集的扩展。
